name: Metatile (8px) Plugin
author: Mico27
description:
Integrates the concept of metatiles in gbstudio (8px version)
WARNING: this plugin modifies the following engine files:
- collision.h
- data_manager.h
- load_save.h
- projectiles.h
- scroll.h
- vm.i
- vm_exceptions.h
- adventure.h
- platform.h
- pointnclick.h
- shmup.h
- topdown.h
- collision.c
- core.c
- data_manager.c
- load_save.c
- scroll.c
- vm_scene.c
- adventure.c
- platform.c
- pointnclick.c
- shmup.c
- topdown.c
Any other plugin that modifies any of these files will not be compatible with this plugin unless the files are manually merged.
